title: Illinois adopts new LGBTQ+ protections for community deemed 'under attack' in the US
description: Illinois is making it easier for gay couples to marry and moving toward gender-inclusive language in laws affecting LGBTQ+ youth in foster care through two new laws signed Friday by Gov. J.B. Pritzker

title: Judge in FTX bankruptcy rejects media challenge, says customer names can remain secret
description: A Delaware bankruptcy judge says the names of individual customers of collapsed cryptocurrency exchange FTX Trading can be permanently shielded from public disclosure

title: Officer who raced to Parkland massacre scene testifies against deputy who stayed outside
description: A police officer who rushed inside a classroom building during the Parkland school shooting says he encountered a sheriff's deputy outside who confirmed the shooter was upstairs

title: Boris Johnson quits as UK lawmaker after being told he will be sanctioned
description: Former U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson says he’s quitting as a lawmaker after being told he will be sanctioned for misleading Parliament

title: Blue Jays cut pitcher Anthony Bass after latest anti-LGBTQ+ comments
description: The Toronto Blue Jays cut pitcher Anthony Bass on Friday, one day after the right-handed reliever said he didn’t think an anti-LGBTQ+ social media post he shared last month was hateful

title: WATCH:  Special Counsel's indictment against Trump unsealed
description: Former President Donald Trump has been charged with 37 counts, including willful retention of national defense information.

title: Maine abortion laws expansion, which would be among broadest in US, passes committee
description: A committee of the Maine Legislature has signed off on a proposal from Democratic Gov. Janet Mills that would give the state one of the least restrictive abortion laws in the country

title: Vatican: Pope sitting up, working from an armchair after abdominal surgery
description: The Vatican says Pope Francis is “progressively improving” and sitting in an armchair working

title: Trump federal indictment unsealed in classified documents probe
description: The special counsel investigating former President Donald Trump unsealed the federal indictment and revealed more details about the charges.

title: Giant inflatable ducks make a splash in Hong Kong
description: They mark the return of a pop-art project that sparked a frenzy a decade ago.

title: 'This is secret information': Trump on audio talks about not declassifying documents
description: According to a portion of the transcript obtained by ABC News, Trump is heard acknowledging that the document he claims to have is "highly confidential" and "secret."

title: WATCH:  Rescuers save humpback whale trapped in net
description: The group of intrepid volunteers saved the distressed whale, which was caught in a shark net.

title: Judge Aileen Cannon, Trump appointee, initially assigned to oversee his case: Sources
description: A federal grand jury voted to indict Trump on at least seven federal charges late Thursday as part of an investigation into his handling of classified documents.

title: Loaded gun found in carry-on bag at South Dakota airport is 4th incident this year
description: Officials from the TSA in South Dakota stopped a passenger with a loaded handgun from getting onto a plane in the fourth such incident at the airport this year.

title: Child victims of stabbing attack in France still in critical condition
description: France’s president is heading to the Alps to be at the side of families traumatized by the savage stabbings of four very young children and two adults

title: Governor: Three wounded as drone strikes building in Russian border city
description: A Russian regional governor says three people were lightly wounded after a drone crashed into a residential building in central Voronezh, a city in southwestern Russia near the border with Ukraine

title: 18-year-old arrested for raising money for ISIS through gift card scheme on dark web
description: An 18-year-old man has been arrested for allegedly trying to raise money for ISIS through a gift card scheme on the dark web.

title: UAE turns to coral nurseries to restore reefs dying in warming seas
description: Restoration efforts are underway in the United Arab Emirates as coral reefs face threats in the Persian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman

title: Mexico charges migrant in detention center fire that killed 40
description: A federal judge in Mexico has charged another migrant for his suspected role in the March blaze at a border detention center that left 40 dead and dozens more wounded

title: Jury returns verdict after finding Chevron covered up toxic pit on California land
description: A California jury has returned a $63 million verdict against Chevron after finding the oil giant covered up a toxic chemical pit on land purchased by a man who built a house on it and was later diagnosed with a blood cancer

title: Biden picks longtime transportation official as acting head of the FAA
description: The Federal Aviation Administration has another acting leader at the controls

title: Louisiana governor says he intends to veto anti-LGBTQ+ bills
description: Louisiana Gov. John Bel Edwards, a Democrat, said Thursday he intends to veto a package of bills passed by the GOP-dominated legislature that targets the LGBTQ+ community, including a ban on gender-affirming care for transgender minors and the state’s ...
